Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2010 11:20AM positiveme wrote: Yunlee I am in New Brunswick and use Dr. Nissenblatt's group. One office in New Brunswick and one in East Brunswick. They are fantastic. I was 44 at dx 1cm stage 1 grade 2. My onc type was 17. I wanted chemo for peace of mind. It is my body and I have to live with what I deceide. I needed to know that I did everything possible to attack this disease. I had a rt. mx and did 4 rounds of CT. The chemo was doable and I only missed 2 days of work all during my treatments. My doctor listen to me and we made a plan. It is YOUR choice. Find a good doctor that will listen to you THINK POSITIVE Catherine
Posts.Title: StageIIA, Oncotype 17- NO CHEMO, Are you Agree? yunlee72 ColoGal
